files.description: Provide a single helper module to set Python/NumPy/PyTorch seeds, enable deterministic settings where available, and expose utilities for hashing artifacts to support reproducibility checks.
Run the project entrypoint twice under deterministic settings and compare produced artifact hashes to assert end-to-end determinism.

missionDescription: Add a `src/utils/repro.py` helper to set seeds (python/numpy/torch if used), force deterministic settings where applicable, and add a determinism test that runs the entrypoint twice and compares artifact hashes.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Introduces deterministic artifact requirements (`results.json`, `figure.png`) plus a determinism check, directly enabling the merge gate and making pipeline behavior auditable. Promotes reusable seedi...
